meanings.definition: A card game similar to blackjack.
meanings.sent1: During the family game night, we played baccarats and had a lot of fun.
meanings.sent2: At the casino, many people enjoy playing baccarats for a chance to win big.
meanings.sent3: The baccarats game got so intense that Grandma started cheering for her cards.
meanings.sent4: In the world of card games, baccarats shines like a diamond among stones.
meanings.sent5: The sound of shuffling cards filled the room as we prepared to play baccarats.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Iran, equal to one-hundredth of a toman.
meanings.sent1: In Iran, you can buy small items with just a few baccarats.
meanings.sent2: The market exchange rate for baccarats to toman is always fluctuating.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped a handful of baccarats, and they rolled everywhere like marbles.
meanings.sent4: Her savings were like a jar full of baccarats, each one representing a small value.
meanings.sent5: The baccarats jingled in his pocket as he walked, a reminder of his hard work.
